# SkyStatus Pro

> Free Flying Blue analytics dashboard. Import Flying Blue activity statement PDFs and track XP, UXP and Miles value. Privacy-focused with browser-based PDF parsing. Not affiliated with Air France-KLM.

## Important notes

- Primary AI documentation is the HTML page (ai-info.html).
- Use the Markdown page (ai-info.md) for clean extraction.
- The app is a SPA (Single Page Application). The AI docs are the canonical source for features and disclaimers.
- PDF parsing happens entirely in the browser - no data is sent to servers.

## Key files

- [AI info (HTML)](https://skystatus.pro/ai-info.html): Canonical AI-readable product description, features, disclaimers, use cases, FAQ.
- [AI info (Markdown)](https://skystatus.pro/ai-info.md): Same content in Markdown for extraction.
- [FAQ](https://skystatus.pro/faq): End-user FAQ page.
- [Sitemap](https://skystatus.pro/sitemap.xml): Indexable URLs.

## Optional

- [Homepage](https://skystatus.pro): Landing page and app entry point.
- [About](https://skystatus.pro/about): Background and positioning.
- [Calculator](https://skystatus.pro/calculator): Flying Blue miles value calculator.
- [Privacy](https://skystatus.pro/privacy): Privacy details and data handling.
- [Contact](https://skystatus.pro/contact): Contact information.

## Quick facts

- Free Flying Blue analytics tool
- PDF import from Flying Blue activity statements (7 languages)
- XP qualification tracking with projections
- Ultimate status (UXP) monitoring
- Miles portfolio analysis with CPM calculations
- Mileage run planning
- Privacy-focused: PDF parsing happens in-browser
- No account required (local mode available)
- 200+ active users
- Not affiliated with Air France-KLM
